skills.name: Divine Masterplan
skills.description:
Charged cannon. 1st Sequence: Single shot.
2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.
3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.
Wielder deals 45.0% bonus Ice DMG. Herrscher of Reason equip bonus: Triggering Ultimate Evasion skill creates 3 hover guns and each deals 3x60.00% ATK of Ice DMG.

skills.name: Structural Truth
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 20s]Unleash a constructor matrix attack dealing 3x600.0% ATK of Ice DMG. Final hit freezes enemies for 5s and inflicts 10 Rime Trauma. Casting the skill boosts wielder's Total DMG by 50.0% for 7s.Herrscher of Reason equip bonus: Active skill renders enemies Analyzed for 7s and restores 180 Konstruktyom in 3s.

skills.name: Total Analysis
skills.description:
Charged and Ultimate ATKs deal 30.0% bonus Total DMG.
Herrscher of Reason equip bonus: Charged ATKs restore 3.0 SP in non-bike mode.
